sentences.en: ...a computer protocol which could communicate across different languages.
sentences.cn: …一个可以在不同的语言之间传递信息的计算机协议。

sentences.en: According to protocol, he first reported to the Director of the hospital.
sentences.cn: 根据礼节，他先向医院院长报到。

sentences.en: He has become something of a stickler for the finer observances of royal protocol.
sentences.cn: 他已经变得非常刻板，哪怕是最细微的皇室礼仪也会遵循。

sentences.en: I didn't know the army taught surveillance protocol.
sentences.cn: 我不知道军队还会教你们追踪技能.

sentences.en: Identify interoperability issues with the organization's partners ( for example, topology, protocol )
sentences.cn: 确定与合作伙伴的互用性问题 ( 例如, 拓扑 、 协议 )

sentences.en: Once in a while, emergency justified a break with protocol.
sentences.cn: 偶而遇到紧急情况, 就得破例了.

sentences.en: Particularly the author explains Point - to - point protocol ( PPP ) realization exhaustively.
sentences.cn: 特别对 点对点 协议 ( PPP ) 协议的实现做了详尽阐述.

sentences.en: Real - time allows the T .30 protocol to be relayed across the IP network.
sentences.cn: 实时 模式允许T.30协议在IP网上中继(分段传送).

sentences.en: The organizer was familiar with the protocol of royal visits.
sentences.cn: 组织者熟悉国王出访的礼仪.
那些政治家签了议定书.

sentences.en: This paper discusses formal description style of communication protocol for computer networks.
sentences.cn: 研讨计算机网络通信协议的形式描述风格.

sentences.en: We must observe the correct protocol.
sentences.cn: 我们必须遵守应有的礼仪.

sentences.en: Were the seating arrangements for the dinner party according to protocol?
sentences.cn: 餐会的坐位安排是根据礼节的需要 吗 ?

sentences.en: What is your lab's protocol for the collection of any monetary evidence?
sentences.cn: 你们实验室对于货币证物收集有何规程?

sentences.en: While all round him the area fairly seethed with protocol.
sentences.cn: 而在他的周围完全洋溢着外交礼节的气氛.

phrases.tran_cn: 传送协议，点到点传输协议

trans.tran_cn: 礼仪，（外交条约的）草案，（数据传递的）协议，科学实验报告（或计划）
trans.tran_en: a system of rules about the correct way to behave on an official occasion
